channel.title: NPR Programs: All Things Considered
channel.description: All Things Considered hosts Ailsa Chang, Mary Louise Kelly, Juana Summers and Scott Detrow present the program's trademark mix of news, interviews, commentaries, reviews, and offbeat features 7 days a week.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: Boost hope and reduce stress with this simple social media trick
item.description: Social media can push us to the dark side with negative content. A new study finds watching inspiring videos for just three minutes a day can boost your mood and reduce stress.
item.content:encoded: Social media can push us to the dark side with negative content. A new study finds watching inspiring videos for just three minutes a day can boost your mood and reduce stress.
item.dc:creator: Allison Aubrey

item.title: A nonprofit in Washington state provides smart homes for people with ALS
item.description: A nonprofit based in Coeur d'Alene, Idaho, is providing smart homes to people with ALS. They use eye tracking software and a small joystick to control everything in the house.
item.content:encoded: A nonprofit based in Coeur d'Alene, Idaho, is providing smart homes to people with ALS. They use eye tracking software and a small joystick to control everything in the house.
item.dc:creator: Phineas Pope

item.title: Descendants of Colorado ski troops hike in the Italian mountains they helped liberate
item.description: Families of Colorado-based troops who liberated Italian mountain regions in World War 2 visit the area and talk with locals about fascism on the 80th anniversary of the war's end.
item.content:encoded: Families of Colorado-based troops who liberated Italian mountain regions in World War 2 visit the area and talk with locals about fascism on the 80th anniversary of the war's end.
item.dc:creator: Stina Sieg

item.title: Hurricane Melissa bears down on Jamaica as a dangerous Category 5 storm
item.description: Hurricane Melissa will hit Jamaica as a massive Category 5 storm, and dump huge amounts of rain. Climate change makes large, rainy storms more likely.
item.content:encoded: Hurricane Melissa will hit Jamaica as a massive Category 5 storm, and dump huge amounts of rain. Climate change makes large, rainy storms more likely.
item.dc:creator: Rebecca Hersher

item.title: Adventurous jazz drummer Jack DeJohnette dies at age 83
item.description: The dynamic drummer worked with jazz innovators and avant-garde pioneers across his career.
item.content:encoded: The dynamic drummer worked with jazz innovators and avant-garde pioneers across his career.
item.dc:creator: Isabella Gomez Sarmiento

item.title: Trump administration says emergency funds can't be used to keep SNAP benefits going
item.description: The Trump administration now says it won't use a contingency fund to pay SNAP benefits to about 1 in 8 Americans in November, a departure from earlier guidance announced before the shutdown.
item.content:encoded:
The Trump administration now says it won't use a contingency fund to pay SNAP benefits to about 1 in 8 Americans in November, a departure from earlier guidance announced before the shutdown.

(Image credit: Hapabapa)
item.dc:creator: Stephen Fowler

item.title: 2 suspects arrested, 2 still sought by police after Louvre jewel heist
item.description: French police question two suspects in the Louvre jewelry theft, caught thanks to DNA evidence.
item.content:encoded: French police question two suspects in the Louvre jewelry theft, caught thanks to DNA evidence.
item.dc:creator: Eleanor Beardsley

item.title: In Cameroon, the world's oldest leader claims victory -- again
item.description: 92-year- old Paul Biya, the world's oldest head of state, claims victory in a disputed election, sparking unrest across the country already grappling with violence, corruption, and political tension.
item.content:encoded:
92-year- old Paul Biya, the world's oldest head of state, claims victory in a disputed election, sparking unrest across the country already grappling with violence, corruption, and political tension.

(Image credit: AFP via Getty Images)
item.dc:creator: Emmanuel Akinwotu

item.title: Billboard listed the biggest 25 Halloween songs of all time. We beg to differ
item.description: Billboard ranked what they consider the best Halloween songs. All Things Considered staffers have strong opinions about Billboard's take.
item.content:encoded: Billboard ranked what they consider the best Halloween songs. All Things Considered staffers have strong opinions about Billboard's take.
item.dc:creator: Alejandra Marquez Janse

item.title: ACLU says Trump administration is breaching family separation settlement
item.description: A settlement was reached to reunite and provide services for immigrant families that were separated at the border, but the ACLU says the Trump administration is severely undermining the agreement.
item.content:encoded: A settlement was reached to reunite and provide services for immigrant families that were separated at the border, but the ACLU says the Trump administration is severely undermining the agreement.
item.dc:creator: Mark Betancourt
